content.rendered: Sangeeth joined Regent in 2014 and is based within the Marketing Team in Sri Lanka. A graduate of University of Kelaniya, Sangeeth has twelve years of extensive experience in web development, web design, software engineering, computer hardware and networking and is an expert in applications/programming languages. He has served many private and public sector organizations in a wide variety of roles. Sangeeth has been with Regent for over six years managing web design, development and maintenance and various aspects of digital marketing.
